Row.Text: Who is the REAL King of Conquerors?
That insolent {1_LeaderName} claims to be the true leader of Macedonia, Greece, and the Hellenic empires! It's time to show him who really holds the title of King of Conquerors![NEWLINE]
I am the true Alexander the Great!
Why fight? Why not rule together?

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Diplomatic relations between you and {1_CivName} lowered[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]If you completely eliminate {1_CivName} from the game, you will gain a weakened version of {2_LeaderName}'s trait: {3_Description}[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]{2_LeaderName} will also be notified of this and will receive a weakened version of your trait if you are completely eliminated by them[ENDCOLOR]
You have declared your status as the true King of Conquerors, and have challenged your impostor to fight you over the title!
You will attempt to work with your "impostor" to dominate the world.
[ICON_INFLUENCE] City-State Influence decay rate is reduced by 33%
The other one calling himself the King of Conquerors has declared your status as the true King of Conquerors a farce! He has challenged you to fight over the title!
The "impostor" King of Conquerors has set aside some of his differences with you in the hopes that the two of you can rule the world together.
